testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to be able to delete course category information with the specified id number via API connection.
testcase.name: Verify that the deleted course category via API is successfully deleted by sending a GET request to
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/category/896" path parameters......................passed * The api user sends a GET request and saves the returned response..........passed * The api user verifies that the "data.message" information in the response body is "There is not category for this id."..passed
